row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SANITY_CHECK :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_REQUIRED.UPDATE_APPLN :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES !following are sanity checks on the input data : SET &number# = STR_LENGTH (&UC4RB_WAS_PACKAGE#) : SET &ext_start_pos# = SUB(&number#, 3) : SET &ext# = STR_CUT( &UC4RB_WAS_PACKAGE#, &ext_start_pos# ) : SET &ext# = CONV_UC(&ext#)
:PRINT "Extension of the package is: &ext#" :IF &ext# <> ".EAR" : PRINT "incorrect file name extension found. only .ear files are allowed" exit 1 :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PACKAGE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_WAS_PACKAGE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.DEFINE_WSADMIN@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.UPDATE_APP :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
